attributes.action: Every person on benefits to be treated the same  stop multiple benefits
attributes.additional_details: All immigrant get extra money  from the government  but English do not this put the division in place And make English people feel like they are second class citizens in their own country
attributes.background: The government have reduced multiple benefits recently but have not stopped people with more than one spouse receiving extra if these persons want to live in england

rejection.details:
It’s not clear what the petition is asking the UK Government or Parliament to do.

In response to an earlier petition on this subject, the Government said:

"Marriages which take place in the United Kingdom must be monogamous. Polygamous marriages which take place abroad may be recognised but will make a household no better off under the benefit system."

It is therefore not clear what action you would like the Government to take. 

You can read the full response:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/108431
